channel.title: Homeworld IP bought by Gearbox
channel.description:
[url='https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2013/04/22/and-homeworld-went-to-gearbox/?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+RockPaperShotgun+%28Rock%2C+Paper%2C+Shotgun%29']SON OF A BITCH[/url]
On one hand a remake or re-release for modern systems would be nice for people who don't want to fiddle around a lot, and it's nice that they love the series but on the other, well, [url='https://www.gearboxsoftware.com/games/aliens-colonial-marines']they "loved" this too[/url]

item.title: Homeworld IP bought by Gearbox
item.dc:creator: JohnWorfin
item.description:
Homeworld was one of the best games I have ever played. I was hoping it would show up on GOG or Steam. Now it might

Read full topic

item.title: Homeworld IP bought by Gearbox
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
That is a good thing, but unless they really do it themselves (and even then I’m iffy) I’m not sure they could match the first game and the expansion in terms of quality, maybe mechanically if they are faithful, but story-wise (and acting) had lent a shit ton to the experience in HW1 and especially Cataclysm (though HW2 was kinda eh in this regard)

Read full topic

item.description:
That’s exactly what they’re planning to do.
